meanings.definition: Resembling a goat in behavior or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The goatish man jumped around the field playfully.
meanings.sent2: The farm had a goatish smell that reminded me of the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The goatish child kept butting heads with his friends during the game.
meanings.sent4: Her goatish laughter echoed through the barnyard, sounding just like a goat.
meanings.sent5: The goatish grin on his face made him look mischievous and playful.

meanings.sent1: He couldn't control his goatish desires and kept staring at her.
meanings.sent2: The movie portrayed the villain as a goatish character, always chasing after women.
meanings.sent3: The goatish old man winked at the waitress, making her blush.
meanings.sent4: His goatish behavior at the party made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The goatish look in his eyes revealed his true intentions.
